body:
FYI this is almost working. 

WORKSPACE:
```
git_repository(
    name = "com_github_grpc_grpc",
    remote = "https://github.com/grpc/grpc.git",
    commit = "fb2eb5279e3979f959163261f7d25543d078e869",
)
load("@com_github_grpc_grpc//bazel:grpc_deps.bzl", "grpc_deps")
grpc_deps()
```

Result of attempted build:

```
$ bazel build @com_github_grpc_grpc//test/cpp/util:grpc_cli
(08:57:41) INFO: Current date is 2017-12-24
(08:57:41) INFO: Analysed target @com_github_grpc_grpc//test/cpp/util:grpc_cli (0 packages loaded).
(08:57:41) INFO: Found 1 target...
(08:57:41) ERROR: /home/nictuku/workspace/cache/79fb694757df0230db440760f7c2ce14/external/com_github_grpc_grpc/src/proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/BUILD:21:1: output 'external/com_github_grpc_grpc/src/proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/reflection.pb.h' was not created
(08:57:41) ERROR: /home/nictuku/workspace/cache/79fb694757df0230db440760f7c2ce14/external/com_github_grpc_grpc/src/proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/BUILD:21:1: output 'external/com_github_grpc_grpc/src/proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/reflection.pb.cc' was not created
(08:57:41) ERROR: /home/nictuku/workspace/cache/79fb694757df0230db440760f7c2ce14/external/com_github_grpc_grpc/src/proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/BUILD:21:1: not all outputs were created or valid
Target @com_github_grpc_grpc//test/cpp/util:grpc_cli failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
(08:57:41) INFO: Elapsed time: 0.527s, Critical Path: 0.04s
(08:57:41) FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully
```

There's some stutter in `proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/proto/grpc/reflection/v1alpha/reflection.pb.cc` but I'm not yet sure what's causing it.

FYI the error above may be a result of a failed build in my OSX system. It could be a local problem - needs further investigation.  Results from the earlier attempt: https://gist.github.com/nictuku/925c6e2b0e81bf14a818ec7649ae54dc

For posterity, this works fine for me on macOS:

```
git_repository(
    name = "com_github_grpc_grpc",
    remote = "https://github.com/grpc/grpc.git",
    commit = "v1.16.0",
)

load("@com_github_grpc_grpc//bazel:grpc_deps.bzl", "grpc_deps")

grpc_deps()
```

It builds and runs:

```
$ bazel run @com_github_grpc_grpc//test/cpp/util:grpc_cli
INFO: Analysed target @com_github_grpc_grpc//test/cpp/util:grpc_cli (0 packages loaded).
INFO: Found 1 target...
Target @com_github_grpc_grpc//test/cpp/util:grpc_cli up-to-date:
  bazel-bin/external/com_github_grpc_grpc/test/cpp/util/grpc_cli
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.140s, Critical Path: 0.00s
INFO: 0 processes.
INFO: Build completed successfully, 1 total action
INFO: Build completed successfully, 1 total action
No command specified
  grpc_cli ls ...         ; List services
  grpc_cli call ...       ; Call method
  grpc_cli type ...       ; Print type
  grpc_cli parse ...      ; Parse message
  grpc_cli totext ...     ; Convert binary message to text
  grpc_cli tobinary ...   ; Convert text message to binary
  grpc_cli help ...       ; Print this message, or per-command usage
```

I think this issue can be closed.
